QuestData.Title: Hodir's Tribute
QuestData.CompletionText: No ordinary tributes were good enough for the great Hodir when he walked among the frost giants.$B$BHe might not be with us anymore, but we've kept the tradition of offering tribute to his strength and wisdom. It would do much for your renown to partake in this tradition, small $c.
QuestData.RewardText: The Sons of Hodir accept your tribute, small one. You continue to prove your worth as an ally in more ways than one.
